name: HAMILTON COUNTY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS
sampleDescriptions: Assist client with monitoring and lobbying on federal government matters of interest to local government, including COVID-19, infrastructure, and funding opportunities.
Monitor Congressional activity with respect to surface transportation legislation and funding opportunities related to large-scale public infrastructure projects.
